page.title: 05Mr&Mrs B. (A Retired Couple)
page.content: Mr B.lived in St Ives until he was 20, then he moved to London for the rest of his working life.He joined the RAF in 1939 and in 1952 he joined the retail trade.He now lives in Needingworth enjoying his retirement with his wife.His wife came from London.They both like the village because it makes a change from their life in London,but they think that there should be a village hall.They think that their biggest change has been their retirement,they have time for horticulture and W.I. They are enjoying the present day because of the higher standard of living.However they don't like the hooliganism that is reported.Mrs B. used to go to church but her legs prevent this now.Mr B. does the shopping in the village.He goes by car.
